text: Oni zhdut ukazaniy ot tebya kasatel'no ikh zhenshchin. Skazhi: "Allakh dayet vam ukazaniya o nikh I to, chto vam chitayetsya v sey Knige: I otnositel'no sirot, Kotorym ne dayete vy togo, Chto vam predpisano davat', Zhelaya vzyat' ikh v zheny. O bezzashchitnykh slabykh detyakh. I chtob vsegda ko vsem sirotam Vy strogo soblyudali spravedlivost'. I chto by dobrogo ni sovershili vy, Allakh, poistine, ob etom znayet
